title: Ubisoft is bringing Roller Champions and a new Rabbids game to Google Stadia
content:
Google Stadia has been pretty slow to add new games to its platform so far this year, but there are a few big ones on the horizon. This week, Ubisoft has confirmed that Roller Champions and a new Rabbids game to Stadia.

The post Ubisoft is bringing Roller Champions and a new Rabbids game to Google Stadia appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Ubisoft has officially confirmed that it will bring Roller Champions and a new Rabbids game to Google Stadia soon.
